e46ebf1d-18ae-4819-89bb-183c25fc8136.description: Earners of the Meeting Management badge have a fundamental understanding of tasks and details involved in developing and coordinating smaller meetings that tend to happen within a typical business day. These meetings, which are important to accomplishing business goals, may include board of directors meetings, shareholders meetings, staff meetings, client/customer meetings and international meetings. Earners have demonstrated knowledge & skills in all aspects of conducting successful meetings.
e46ebf1d-18ae-4819-89bb-183c25fc8136.name: Meeting Management

issuer.summary: issued by Waukesha County Technical College

badge_template_activities.title: Earner has completed and scored a minimum of 87% or higher on an extensive case study involving the following components: Meeting research, Meeting planning, Preparation of meeting notice, Preparation of meeting agenda, Creation of the meeting evaluation form.

908e1a57-f450-475c-bc05-4f966b7e392c.description: Earners of the Python Programming Basics badge have a fundamental understanding of how to write Python scripts that process input and output files, manipulate strings, parse text, perform calculations and write Regular Expressions. Earners have demonstrated knowledge & skills in basic Python programming fundamentals.
908e1a57-f450-475c-bc05-4f966b7e392c.name: Python Programming Basics

issuer.summary: issued by Waukesha County Technical College

badge_template_activities.title: Earner has completed and scored a minimum of 87% or higher on a final programming project involving the following components: Analyze tasks and processes by breaking them into steps, utilize variables in a program, write expressions in a program, create a program that implements decisions, utilize functions in a program, create a program that implements loops, implement collections and handle file input and output.

c822bdfe-961a-46ab-8d9e-af83efd07878.description: Participants learn a proven, state of the art methodology for improving processes to enhance quality and reduce costs. Each Green Belt participant will complete a project which will serve as a foundation for application based learning using Lean Six Sigma tools. Instructors will help participants scope their projects and guide them through all aspects of the project until completion.
c822bdfe-961a-46ab-8d9e-af83efd07878.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt

issuer.summary: issued by Waukesha County Technical College

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completion of this training, learners will have created a project charter, project team charter, data collection plan, process map, control plan, along with null and alternative hypotheses, problem statement, business case, goal statement, process and scope description, and timeline.  Each Green Belt participant will complete a project which will serve as a foundation for application based learning using Lean Six Sigma tools.
